channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins BearyChat Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins BearyChat Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-24459|2024-08-02T10:56:04.164Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bearychat%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins BearyChat Plugin 3.0.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-24458|2024-08-02T10:56:04.166Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bearychat%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins BearyChat Plugin 3.0.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.
